Name: PaperCat
About the game: PaperCat is a game about Slick the cat and Frank his human, who loves him despite all the mess he make! It's a 2D puzzle platform game. Pursue butterfly and break things in the way! But shhh... don't awake Frank! In the game you control every Slick action: *move *jump *dash According the sequence of that action you will finish each stage. The game has 4 stage sets, each set has its own way to be solved. The stage is clear when all objects are broken or the time counter reachs 0.
